clues.text: The famous pirate Jean Lafitte became a hero when he fought in the Battle of New Orleans during this war

rounds.comments: (Alex: These are cross-references from Merriam-Webster's Collegiate Encyclopedia.)

clues.text: If you look up Boulder Dam, you'll find see: this alternate name

For laughing jackass, see: kookaburra; for laughing gas, see: this compound
